## ðŸ“± DEPLOYMENT READY
Your Wassel ride-sharing app is now built and ready for deployment!

### Quick Deploy Options:

#### 1. Local Server (Testing)
```bash
serve build -p 3000
```

#### 2. Vercel (Production)
```bash
vercel login
vercel --prod
```

#### 3. Netlify (Production)
```bash
netlify login
netlify deploy --prod --dir=build
```

#### 4. Static Hosting
Upload `build/` folder to any static host:
- GitHub Pages
- AWS S3
- Firebase Hosting
- Surge.sh
